casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Earl James WATSON No. 387P05-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of NC. Mary March Exum, Attorney at Law, for Watson, Earl James.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 25th of January 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 26th of January 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Catawba County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
